  • CMD Manual

    • /?
      • tree
        • del
          • mkdir/rmdir
            • echo
              • type a.txt
                • dir
                  • path

                  # CMD Manual

                  # /?

                  help

                  # tree

                  tree file sturcture

                  # del

                  /f force
                  /s file
                  /q quite
                  /* all

                  # mkdir/rmdir

                  mk-make
                  rm-remove

                  # echo

                  echo xx > a.txt cover to a.txt
                  echo xx >> a.txt add to a.txt

                  # type a.txt

                  show a.txt

                  # dir

                  . present dir
                  .. before dir
                  cd change dir
                  dir /w wide /p page

                  PS:change disk use C:

                  # path

                  echo %pash%
                  set show all pash
                  set pash only in memory
